short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Experience the power of Raiden Shogun, surrounded by pink and purple hues, as purple lightning crackles through the atmosphere.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Immerse yourself in the electrifying world of Raiden Shogun with this stunning theme.

🎨 Minimalist Design: Featuring Raiden Shogun, surrounded by pink and purple hues, with vibrant purple lightning striking in the background, capturing her power and divine presence.
⏰ Clock and Date: Stay updated with time in a display that mirrors Raiden Shogun's elegance and authority.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Effortlessly access your favorite websites, powered by the same precision and strength Raiden Shogun commands.
🎮 Play Games: Dive into action-packed mini-games inspired by Raiden Shogun's mastery of power and strategy.
🔍 Search Bar: Perform fast, efficient searches with the same sharpness and intensity as Raiden Shogun’s divine energy.
🚀 More Extensions: Enhance your browsing experience with features that amplify the power and grace of Raiden Shogun.
